q1: IS Colombia a world class team?
a1: No Colombia is good but not world class.
a2: Colombia might not be the best in South America, but they are better than most of the rest of the world.
q3: Not that great but they continue to be better.
a3: Yes, they are still top 30 world wide
a4: He has not won a championship many years ago
q5: Is Colombia a better team than Uruguay?
a5: I don't believe so.  Uruguay did better at the World Cup.
